tambapupphiya： tambapupphiya（ti）
တမ္ဗပုပ္ဖိယ（တိ）
[tambapuppha-iya]
[တမ္ဗပုပ္ဖ-ဣယ]

Tambapupphiya：A thera．Ninety-one kappas ago he had fled into the forest，having committed some crime．



There he saw the Bodhi-tree of the Buddha Piyadassī，and having swept the ground around it，he scattered flowers．



Three kappas ago he was a king named Samphusita （Ap．i．176）．



He is probably identical with Vanavaccha Theta．ThagA．i．222f．

tambapupphiya：တမ္ဗပုပ္ဖိယ（တိ）
[တမ္ဗပုပ္ဖ-ဣယ]
သော်ကပန်းဖြင့် ပူဇော်သော၊ သူ။
